title: Degree of a polynomial
text: The degree of a polynomial is the highest degree of all its terms.

title: Degree of a term
text: The degree of a term is the sum of the exponents of its variables.

title: Term with the highest degree
text: $$\operatorname{20}\left(x^2\right) y^2$$ and $$\operatorname{10}\left(a^2\right) b^2$$ are both the term with the highest degree. Choose one term to work with and determine its degree.
